channel.title: Simple Fishing Method

item.title: Simple Fishing Method
item.dc:creator: @project_fallout project fallout
item.description:
@project_fallout wrote:

well, first, declare these

int fishWait;
public void fishThis(int anim, int fish, int delay){
if(fishWait == 0) {
/*idr how to do animations :/ it'd just be like this*/
animation = anim;
addItem(fish, 1);
fishWait = delay * 2;
} else {
}
}

in process (if you use an event manager, just use it, much better) anyway

if(fishWait > 0) { --fishWait; }

then to execute it w/ anim #500, fish id #333, and wait 2 sencds between fishing

fishThis(500, 333, 2);

ps: i wrote this in 30 seconds, so expect errors

BTW: i wrote all of this on my mac, w/o access to a server, so itâ€™s shit lmao, but still, it works
